lead_paragraph: ZEIDMAN--Helen. Helen Sue Flatow Zeidman, beloved mother, grandmother and great-grandmother passed away Saturday, February 6, 2016. She was preceded in death by her loving husband of 61 years, Lewis. Sue was born and raised in New York City. She attended New York University where she graduated with a degree in marketing and obtained her Masters degree in Psychology from Queens College. She was an active volunteer and leader in her community of Harrison, NY. Sue was a past president of her local chapter of Hadassah, past president of the sisterhood and a Board member and officer of the Jewish Community Center of Harrison. In addition, Sue spearheaded the sandwich drive in her home town, which provided thousands of meals for those in need. Sue was loved and admired by all she touched. She is survived by her daughter Laurel (Alan), Clarks Summit, PA; son, Mark (Margaret), Palm Beach, FI; grandchildren, Drs. Jessica Zeidman Ziperstein (Dr. Joshua); Steven Glassman (Christin), Joseph Zeidman (Laura), Adam Glassman; and six great-grandchildren, as well as many nieces and nephews. 1/3
